Package order

Class Order

java.lang.Object
order.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an Order placed in the restaurant
Since:
2021-11-13

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Order()
    Creates a default new Order with current date with reference number -1.
    Order​(Date dateRec, int referenceNo, int tableno, int staff, boolean fulfill, boolean memberStatus)
    Create a new Order with given date, reference number and table number.

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order()
      Creates a default new Order with current date with reference number -1.

    • Order

      public Order​(Date dateRec, int referenceNo, int tableno, int staff, boolean fulfill, boolean memberStatus)
      Create a new Order with given date, reference number and table number.
      Parameters:
      dateRec - This Order's received date
      referenceNo - This Order's reference number
      tableno - This Order's assigned Table number
      staff - This Order's staff ID number
      fulfill - This Order's fulfilled status
      memberStatus - This Order's guest membership status
